text: Horsfieldia longiflora is a threatened species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is endemic to Vietnam. The species appears to be restricted to submontane evergreen forest. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Horsfieldia longiflora. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
